titleStmt.title: G. M. Witten to Beriah Magoffin
CWG11928

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.collection: 37th - 76th Regiments Enrolled Militia Primary Source Documents (1861-1866)
msIdentifier.idno: Box 80, Folder 861-66 FLOYD COUNTY Elected Officers 38th Rgt. Ky. Militia

body.p:
Floyd
Prestonsburg Ky
May 29 1861
Hon: Beriah Magoffin-
Dear Sir:
A company of "State Guard" has been formed in this County, and the following Gentlemen were elected offircers of said Company:

Alexander L. Martin Captain
Edwin Trimble 1st Lt
Robert S Friend 2nd Lt
Alexander G Hamilton 3d Lt
Your early attention in forwarding the Comissions is desirer --

Yours &c
G M Witten
Col Enrolled Militia. Floyd Co

Floyd Coy --
State-guards --
G M Witten
Captain --
State Guard -- application for arms- file away among the similar papers
